vote.title:
Authorizing the issuance of unlimited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $60,165,000.00 for health, safety and infrastructure-related projects; to authorize the appropriation and expenditure of $4,000,000.00 from the Debt Retirement Fund for costs of issuance; and to declare an emergency ($64,165,000.00).

Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
vote.description:
Explanation
This ordinance authorizes the issuance of unlimited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $60,165,000.00 for health, safety and infrastructure-related projects.  The bond sale will be conducted on a negotiated basis. This ordinance also appropriates and expends $4,000,000.00 from the Debt Retirement Fund (Fund 4430) for costs of issuance related to the bond sale.
Title
Authorizing the issuance of unlimited tax bonds in an amount not to exceed $60,165,000.00 for health, safety and infrastructure-related projects; to authorize the appropriation and expenditure of $4,000,000.00 from the Debt Retirement Fund for costs of issuance; and to declare an emergency ($64,165,000.00).
 
Section 44-1(b) of the City Charter.
 
Body
See attached file: City of Columbus - 2024 Bonds - Unlimited Tax Pub. Safety & Health Ordinance (2019 Election) (final pdf).pdf
